pull.title: compat: remove strnlen back-compat code
pull.body:
This was needed for mingw (not mingw-w64), and some older versions of
macOS, which we no-longer support.

verification.payload:
tree 42d9a55498657ea6ef1537b7c93c6899908b0128
parent 7c72eabb57bde83abfc4bd5af70b884390ef847d
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1648537772 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1648545333 +0100

compat: remove strnlen back-compat code

This was needed for mingw (not mingw-w64), and some older versions of
macOS, which we no-longer support.

events.message:
compat: remove strnlen back-compat code

This was needed for mingw (not mingw-w64), and some older versions of
macOS, which we no-longer support.
